articles.title: Sydney to get 'surf lodge' 75 kilometres from the coast at Wisemans Ferry - Commercial Real Estate News
articles.description: For those looking to surf but don't want to travel to the beach, a new 'surf lodge' will open in Wisemans Ferry on the banks of the Hawkebury River.
articles.content:
Sydney is set to host a new surf resort miles from the nearest beach.
Wisemans Ferry Surf Lodge will be built in the sleepy village of Wisemans Ferry on the banks of the Hawksebury River, about 75 k… [+2158 chars]
